narrativeNotes: Ego consciousness is expanded through shadow integration.
Owning shadow material is a pivotal individuation movement.
Relational eros contributes to symbolic union.
Discerning logos contributes to symbolic union.
The Self acts as telos and ordering center.
Archetypal images mediate approach to totality.
Transformation themes culminate in completion motifs.
Fish symbolism holds paradoxical totality imagery.
The lapis expresses the coniunctio as completed opus.
